Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Chat] Email attachment summarization (Modern Attachments, Item Attachments)
Description:
Users will be able to reason over additional attachment content, along with the email body, in Copilot Chat. Support will be extended to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Pdf, Text, Json and Xml files mentioned in the email as links (Modern Attachments). Additionally, other item attachments, such as email threads, will also be supported.
GA date: September CY2025
